clusterList.phrase: to our surprise the explosion took place on the roof where at least four guards were posted
all of us ran away and then the second bomb went off many policemen were killed and injured in the two blasts these have again ended our dreams of security
there were attacks that targeted senior officers and we thank god they failed and our colleagues are safe
what happened today is far from ideal and if the device was actually a real bomb the way it was handled would have been a disaster
we just finished our bombing run on a sarakoth cruiser and all of a sudden in exploded gollda was caught within the burst
we worked fast to defuse the bombs and the way it was done was risky it was a mistake
i hate to think of what could have happened had they detonated those devices
